dict.acceptation: 很，非常；恰好是，正是；十足的；特有的；

sent.orig: Although my car is very old, it still runs very well.
sent.trans: 我的汽车虽然很旧，但仍然跑得很快。

sent.orig: Children are very conservative where food is concerned,they are very loath to try anything out of the ordinary.
sent.trans: 孩子们在食物上非常保守，他们非常不愿意尝任何特殊的东西。

sent.orig: He was very old,and thence very weak.
sent.trans: 他年纪很老，因而身体很弱。

sent.orig: He's a very sturdy child and very healthy.
sent.trans: 他是个壮实的孩子，长的很健康。

sent.orig: I was very young, and very innocent.
sent.trans: 我那时非常年轻，幼稚无知。
